circumstances: Shortly after take off from Lomé international Airport, while on a cargo flight to Amsterdam, the crew declared an emergency and was cleared for an immediate return. The approach and landing were considered as normal and the aircraft returned safely to the apron. While all three crew members were uninjured, the aircraft was damaged beyond repair due to bulkhead destruction.
probable_cause: It appears that the cargo shifted shortly after rotation and destroyed the bulkhead and several others structural parts inside the airplane.
